Update miner.cpp

Update miner.cpp

events.body: Yes, thanks for the fix, but please file his to the trivial branch, it doesn't get more trivial than this :)

OK, done.
Pull request #50, in theuni/bitcoin branch trivial-next.

@laanwj I understand the reason to use @theuni's trivial repository is to decrease noise here.  But,  how much noise will it reduce really versus just a merge here?
Or is it purely _merge_ noise that we looking to resolve with trivial?
@dcousens it's about pull request noise, about delegation. Reducing merge noise (by grouping related commits) is a nice side effect.
Closing the pull here, thanks for moving it.
